title: Shahid Kapoor’s sister Sanah Kapur wants to do Sadhana’s role in ‘Mera Saaya’
text: Shahid Kapoor’s sister Sanah Kapur wants to do Sadhana’s role in ‘Mera Saaya’ Wednesday, 21 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) Shahid Kapoor's younger sister Sanah Kapoor says she would love to play veteran actress Sadhana's role in the 1966 film "Mera Saaya". Shahid Kapoor Sister 'Sanah' SECRET Audition for Shaandaar Recent related news Debutante Sanah Kapoor, who is essaying the role of Alia Bhatt's elder sister in “Shaandaar“, says the “Highway” actress was “very supportive” of... Filmy Friday 6 days ago - Entertainment Also reported by • Mid-Day • Indian Express You Might Like
